=======
Changelog
=======

0.1.0 (2020-05-05)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.

0.1.28 (2020-05-17)
------------------

* Deriving the project name from `src/<project name>` vs. the top-level directory name.

0.1.30 (2020-05-19)
------------------

* Added logging and updated `whisk create` and `whisk setup` output. (#25)

0.1.31 (2020-05-20)
-----------------

* Several refactoring updates (#27)
